Question: InfinaCore CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
InfinaCore

P3 Pro Portable Charger and Power Bank

- Upgraded version of the P3 Model
- 65W output, 10000mAh battery capacity
- Charges laptops, smartphones, gaming devices, and accessories with two USB-C ports and one USB-A port
- MagSafe compatibility and 15W Qi2 wireless charging integration
- Animated advanced color LCD display showing battery percentage, current output, time to full charge, and temperature
- Portable and lightweight design with retractable silicone finger loop
- Additional adaptor prongs for UK and EU outlets
- Pre-order available for MSRP $129.99, with an entry-level backing price of $74 on Kickstarter
- Shipping begins in Summer 2024
Summary_cn:
InfinaCore

- P3 Pro便携式充电器和移动电源的升级版
-65W输出，10000mAh电池容量
- 通过两个USB-C口和一个USB-A口为笔记本电脑，智能手机，游戏设备和配件充电
- MagSafe兼容性和15W Qi2无线充电集成
- 动画高级彩色液晶显示屏显示电池百分比，当前输出，充满电时间和温度
- 便携轻巧的设计，带有可伸缩的硅胶手指环
- 额外的适配器插脚适用于英国和欧盟插座
- 可以以建议零售价129.99美元的价格进行预订，在Kickstarter上的初始支持价格为74美元
- 预计在2024年夏季开始发货
